custom_css: @media screen and (max-width: 600px) {.image-with-text_title {display: none; } .image-with-text__media-item {display: none; } .image-with-text__text {display: none; } .button--primary {display: none; } .image-with-text {background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0269/9254/1757/files/sugar-free_image.png?v=1685489465); background-attachment: fixed; background-size: contain; background-position: center; }}

settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
.image-with-text__content image-with-text__content--middle image-with-text__content--desktop-left image-with-text__content--mobile-center image-with-text__content--adapt gradient color-background-1 content-container {
padding: 15px 0 43px 0;
    background-color: #faf8fb;
}
.image-with-text__heading h1 {
padding: 0px !important;
}
.image-with-text__content>*+* {
    margin-top: 0;
}
.image-with-text.image-with-text--no-overlap.page-width.isolate {
padding: 10% 0 5% 0;
}
.image-with-text__text-item {
margin: 17% 0 -3% 0;
}
.image-with-text__content  {
   padding: 0;
    margin: 2% 0 6% 0;
}

}
@media screen and (min-width: 601px) {
.image-with-text {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  transform: scale(0.7);
  margin-top: -60px;
}
.image-with-text__content {
  transform: scale(1.4);
  margin-left: 10%;
}
}
.image-with-text__media img {
background-image:linear-gradient(160deg, rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.8), rgba(255, 165, 0, 0));
}
</style>
